title: Part 380 - Paid Family Leave
content:
Part 380 - Paid Family Leave

State Regulations

Subpart 380-1 - Applicability (§ 380-1.1)

Subpart 380-2 - Eligibility (§ 380-2.1 to 380-2.9)

Subpart 380-3 - Notice To Employer of Foreseeable Qualifying Event (§ 380-3.1 to 380-3.5)

Subpart 380-4 - Request for Paid Family Leave, Medical Certification and HIPAA Authorization (§ 380-4.1 to 380-4.4)

Subpart 380-5 - Payment and Denials (§ 380-5.1 to 380-5.6)

Subpart 380-6 - Benefit Rate and Use of Accruals (§ 380-6.1 to 380-6.2)

Subpart 380-7 - Compliance and Coverage (§ 380-7.1 to 380-7.10)

Subpart 380-8 - Reinstatement to Employment (§ 380-8.1 to 380-8.2)

Subpart 380-9 - Disputes (§ 380-9.1 to 380-9.12)

Subpart 380-10 - Voluntary Coverage (§ 380-10.1 to 380-10.2)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
